Class StudentExamPageController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentExamPageController
public class StudentExamPageController extends Object
The controller for the student exam page.

This controller is responsible for managing the student's exam experience, including loading questions, updating the countdown timer, and submitting the exam when completed.
